name: contentful-multi-space
title: Contentful (Multi-Space support)
description: Search for entries across multiple Contentful spaces. Configure which spaces to include in the extension preferences.
author: aaron5670

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

commands.name: search-entries
commands.title: Contentful Entries Search
commands.subtitle: Search for Contentful entries across multiple spaces
commands.description: With this command you can quickly search for Contentful entries

preferences.name: spaces
preferences.title: Contentful Spaces
preferences.description: Configure your Contentful spaces as a JSON array. Example: [{"name":"Marketing","spaceId":"abc123","accessToken":"token123","environment":"master"}]
